column5: Contemporary, creatively-designed home in an ultra-modern neighborhood only 6 miles from downtown, 4 miles to the new shops and park at Mueller, 15 minutes to the Domain, and 20 minutes from McKinney Falls State Park and the Circuit of the Americas track! Comfy bed, large closet, dresser, private bathroom with all the amenities, and a yard with great views of downtown! You will also have access to the washer/dryer if you need to do any mid-travel laundry.
column8: Chic Private Room Minutes from Downtown and Parks
